choices.name: Enrolling
choices.choiceText: I am enrolling my Gardner Denver compressor in the no charge 10-Year Platinum Extended Warranty

choices.name: NotEnrolling
choices.choiceText: I do not wish to take advantage of the Platinum Extended Warranty, the 2 year standard air end warranty is sufficient.

choices.name: Warranty
choices.choiceText: I am enrolling my Gardner Denver compressor in the no charge 10-Year Platinum Extended Warranty

decisions.description: If Airend (High Pressure) Serial Number is not null, then display screens that hold information relevant for VST compressors.
decisions.name: VST_Compressor
decisions.label: VST Compressor?

recordCreates.description: Creates new Machine Startup Form Record with user-entered values from screen flow.
recordCreates.name: Create_Machine_Startup_Form_Record
recordCreates.label: Create Machine Startup Form Record

fields.name: Receipt
fields.fieldText:
Thank you!
Your Startup Checklist Form for {!varSerialNumber.Name} has been submitted.

fields.name: legal_1
fields.fieldText: To be completed by authorized start up personnel only.

fields.name: legal_2
fields.fieldText: To validate warranty, complete and return to factory within 30 days of initial operation.

fields.name: legal_3
fields.fieldText: This is a check list only. It does not replace the instructions contained in the Service Manual.

fields.name: legal_4
fields.fieldText: Always refer to the Service Manual for proper procedures, methods, and operating instructions.

value.stringValue: 3. Overall inspection of package - complete repairs as needed and document.

fields.name: Overall_appearance_and_condition_is_good_except_as_noted
fields.fieldText: Overall appearance and condition is good, except as noted.

fields.name: Ample_space_is_provided_around_the_package_for_air_circulation_maintenance_and_r
fields.fieldText: Ample space is provided around the package for air circulation, maintenance, and repairs.

fields.name: Surface_makes_100_contact_with_bottom_of_package_base_frame
fields.fieldText: Surface makes 100% contact with bottom of package base frame.

fields.name: Hold_down_bolts_cap_screws_are_properly_torque
fields.fieldText: Hold down bolts / cap screws are properly torque.

fields.name: All_pipe_fittings_and_connections_are_checked
fields.fieldText: All pipe fittings and connections are checked.

fields.name: Pressure_relief_valve_s_are_provided_where_needed_and_are_properly_sized
fields.fieldText: Pressure relief valve(s) are provided where needed and are properly sized.

fields.name: Will_ambient_conditions_get_below_freezing
fields.fieldText: Will ambient conditions get below freezing?

fields.name: If_equipped_with_cooling_duct_work_is_it_sized_appropriately
fields.fieldText: If equipped with cooling duct work, is it sized appropriately?

fields.name: Inlet_water_temperature_between_60_90_degrees_Fahrenheit
fields.fieldText: Inlet water temperature between 60-90 degrees Fahrenheit.

fields.name: Piping_sized_right_for_adequater_flow_rate
fields.fieldText: Piping sized right for adequater flow rate/

fields.name: Water_PSIG_between_50_75_PSIG_at_full_rate
fields.fieldText: Water PSIG between 50-75 PSIG at full rate.

fields.name: Incoming_wiring_properly_sized_installed_and_package_properly_grounded
fields.fieldText: Incoming wiring properly sized/installed and package properly grounded.

fields.name: All_connections_checked_for_tightness_and_good_contact
fields.fieldText: All connections checked for tightness and good contact.

value.stringValue: 6. Provide electrical power to package and record operational settings programmed in controller. Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:

fields.name: Section7box1
fields.fieldText: Pull the antenna out of its box, attach it to the compressor roof and route the wire from the antenna to the iConn modem. A hole should already exist above the control box. Remove plug that is currently in that hole.

fields.name: Connect_the_wire_to_the_modem
fields.fieldText: Connect the wire to the modem.

fields.name: If_the_customer_does_not_wish_to_activate_the_iConn_system_do_not_install_the_an
fields.fieldText: If the customer does not wish to activate the iConn system, do not install the antennae.

fields.name: Capture_the_IMEI_number_from_iConn_modem
fields.fieldText: Capture the IMEI number from iConn modem:

value.stringValue: This screen includes screen components that require Lightning runtime.
9. Start compressor and check for proper vent fan rotation (fan blows air outward). If incorrect, proceed as follows:

fields.name: Disconnect_lockout_and_tagout_power_supply_to_the_compressor_package
fields.fieldText: Disconnect, lockout and tagout power supply to the compressor package.

fields.name: section9box2
fields.fieldText: Exchange any two phases of the incoming power line at the distribution block. Note that this tasks does not affect the rotation of any VFS-driven device, such as the main motors or the heat exchanger fan motor.

value.stringValue: 10. Operate compressor and record measurements for each load level expected or achieved: Package input voltage and current while operating (on) and stopped (off):
Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:
VST Compressor Only - Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:
Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:
VST Compressor Only - Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:
VST Compressor Only - Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:
Use controller to navigate to the appropriate location and record:
Record the following water data (water-cooled units):
Review the installation with owner personnel:

fields.name: Ensure_customer_has_access_to_the_manuals_and_diagrams_for_the_package
fields.fieldText: Ensure customer has access to the manuals and diagrams for the package

fields.name: Platinum_Extended_Warranty_Registration
fields.fieldText: Your Gardner Denver compressor is eligible for the no charge Platinum Extended Warranty (10 years on the air end, 5 years on major package components) when you use Gardner Denver parts and lubricant, perform and log maintenance required and utilize the free oil sampling program (see document BT-29 for full details).

fields.name: Please_choose_one_of_the_statements_below
fields.fieldText: Please choose one of the statements below.

fields.name: screen_3_content_5
fields.fieldText: GD Line Reactor Model Number (If applicable)

fields.name: screen_3_content_6
fields.fieldText: Airend (High Pressure) Serial Number - VST Compressors Only

value.stringValue: 1. Check for current operating manual, part lists/controller manual CD, and wiring diagrams.

fields.name: screen_9_title_2
fields.fieldText: Read Operators manual before installing or operating the compressor package.

fields.name: Review_Compressor_Lubrication
fields.fieldText: Review Compressor Lubrication - Separation, Filtration, and Control
